articles.title: Sourcegraph Launches Cody AI Coding Assistant
articles.content: Sourcegraph introduces Cody, an AI coding assistant that leverages the company's code intelligence platform to provide context-aware code suggestions and answers.
articles.summary: Sourcegraph introduces Cody, an AI coding assistant that leverages the company's code intelligence platform to provide context-aware code suggestions and answers....
